main_definition: Hell is a concept or place of severe suffering, typically associated with religious beliefs.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A fiery underworld realm where the wicked are punished after death
meanings_and_examples.example: Many religions depict hell as a place of eternal torment for those who have committed grave sins.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An informal term used to express extreme anger or frustration
meanings_and_examples.example: When he found out his car had been stolen, he said 'I'm going to hell!'

meanings_and_examples.definition: A phrase used as an exclamation to emphasize the severity of a situation or disappointment
meanings_and_examples.example: The project was cancelled last minute. We really hit hell and back trying to finish it on time.
